Name: Win32 Priority Separation
Description: Controls how processor time is shared between foreground apps and background processes. Higher values favor foreground app responsiveness.

Name: Delete Temporary Files
Description: Erases TEMP folders — removes junk from both user and system temp directories

Configuration.PowerShellCommand: try { Remove-Item -Path "$Env:Temp\*" -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {}; try { Remove-Item -Path "$Env:SystemRoot\Temp\*" -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {}; exit 0

Name: Disable ConsumerFeatures
Description: Windows will not automatically install any games, third-party apps, or application links from the Windows Store for the signed-in user. Some default Apps will be inaccessible (eg. Phone Link)

Name: Disable Telemetry
Description: Disables Microsoft Telemetry. Stops Windows from sending diagnostic and usage data to Microsoft.
WarningMessage: May affect Windows Update error reporting

Configuration.PowerShellCommand: New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\AdvertisingInfo' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\AdvertisingInfo' -Name Enabled -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Privacy' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Privacy' -Name TailoredExperiencesWithDiagnosticDataEnabled -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Speech_OneCore\Settings\OnlineSpeechPrivacy' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Speech_OneCore\Settings\OnlineSpeechPrivacy' -Name HasAccepted -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Input\TIPC' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Input\TIPC' -Name Enabled -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization' -Name RestrictImplicitInkCollection -Value 1 -Type DWord; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization' -Name RestrictImplicitTextCollection -Value 1 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization\TrainedDataStore' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization\TrainedDataStore' -Name HarvestContacts -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Personalization\Settings' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Personalization\Settings' -Name AcceptedPrivacyPolicy -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\DataCollection' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\DataCollection' -Name AllowTelemetry -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced' -Name Start_TrackProgs -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System' -Name PublishUserActivities -Value 0 -Type DWord; New-Item 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Siuf\Rules' -Force -EA SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Siuf\Rules' -Name NumberOfSIUFInPeriod -Value 0 -Type DWord; Set-MpPreference -SubmitSamplesConsent 2 -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-Service -Name diagtrack -StartupType Disabled -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-Service -Name wermgr -StartupType Disabled -EA SilentlyContinue; $Memory = (Get-CimInstance Win32_PhysicalMemory | Measure-Object Capacity -Sum).Sum / 1KB; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control' -Name SvcHostSplitThresholdInKB -Value $Memory -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Siuf\Rules' -Name PeriodInNanoSeconds -EA SilentlyContinue; exit 0
Configuration.PowerShellUndoCommand: Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\AdvertisingInfo' -Name Enabled -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Privacy' -Name TailoredExperiencesWithDiagnosticDataEnabled -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Speech_OneCore\Settings\OnlineSpeechPrivacy' -Name HasAccepted -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Input\TIPC' -Name Enabled -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization' -Name RestrictImplicitInkCollection -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization' -Name RestrictImplicitTextCollection -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\InputPersonalization\TrainedDataStore' -Name HarvestContacts -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Personalization\Settings' -Name AcceptedPrivacyPolicy -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\DataCollection' -Name AllowTelemetry -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced' -Name Start_TrackProgs -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System' -Name PublishUserActivities -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Siuf\Rules' -Name NumberOfSIUFInPeriod -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-MpPreference -SubmitSamplesConsent 1 -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-Service -Name diagtrack -StartupType Automatic -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-Service -Name wermgr -StartupType Automatic -EA SilentlyContinue; exit 0

Name: Disable Activity History
Description: This erases recent docs, clipboard, and run history.

Name: Disable Location Tracking
Description: Disables Location Tracking...DUH!

Name: Disable Powershell 7 Telemetry
Description: This will create an Environment Variable called 'POWERSHELL_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT' with a value of '1' which will tell Powershell 7 to not send Telemetry Data.

Name: Disable Windows Platform Binary Table (WPBT)
Description: If enabled then allows your computer vendor to execute a program each time it boots. It enables computer vendors to force install anti-theft software, software drivers, or a software program conveniently. This could also be a security risk.
WarningMessage: May affect OEM software and certain hardware drivers

Name: Enable End Task With Right Click
Description: Enables option to end task when right clicking a program in the taskbar

Name: Run Disk Cleanup
Description: Runs Disk Cleanup on Drive C: and removes old Windows Updates.

Name: Set Services to Manual
Description: Turns a bunch of system services to manual that don't need to be running all the time. This is pretty harmless as if the service is needed, it will simply start on demand.
WarningMessage: Some background features may take longer to start on first use

Name: Brave Debloat
Description: Disables various annoyances like Brave Rewards, Leo AI, Crypto Wallet and VPN

Name: Disable Background Apps
Description: Disables all Microsoft Store apps from running in the background, which has to be done individually since Win11

Name: Disable Fullscreen Optimizations
Description: Disables FSO in all applications. NOTE: This will disable Color Management in Exclusive Fullscreen
WarningMessage: This will disable Color Management in Exclusive Fullscreen

Name: Disable Notification Tray/Calendar
Description: Disables all Notifications INCLUDING Calendar

Name: Edge Debloat
Description: Disables various telemetry options, popups, and other annoyances in Edge.

Name: Adobe Network Block
Description: Reduce user interruptions by selectively blocking connections to Adobe's activation and telemetry servers. Credit: Ruddernation-Designs

Name: Block Razer Software Installs
Description: Blocks ALL Razer Software installations. The hardware works fine without any software. WARNING: this will also block all Windows third-party driver installations.
WarningMessage: This will also block all Windows third-party driver installations

Configuration.PowerShellCommand: $RazerPath = 'C:\Windows\Installer\Razer'; if (Test-Path $RazerPath) { Remove-Item "$RazerPath\*" -Recurse -Force } else { New-Item -Path $RazerPath -ItemType Directory }; icacls $RazerPath /deny 'Everyone:(W)'; exit 0

Name: Disable IPv6
Description: Disables IPv6.
WarningMessage: Some applications and services may require IPv6 to function correctly

Name: Disable Microsoft Copilot
Description: Disables MS Copilot AI built into Windows since 23H2.

Configuration.PowerShellCommand: Get-AppxPackage -AllUsers *Copilot* | Remove-AppxPackage -AllUsers; Get-AppxPackage -AllUsers Microsoft.MicrosoftOfficeHub | Remove-AppxPackage -AllUsers; $Appx = (Get-AppxPackage MicrosoftWindows.Client.CoreAI).PackageFullName; $Sid = (Get-LocalUser $Env:UserName).Sid.Value; New-Item "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Appx\AppxAllUserStore\EndOfLife\$Sid\$Appx" -Force -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-AppxPackage $Appx -EA SilentlyContinue; exit 0

Name: Disable Teredo
Description: Teredo network tunneling is an IPv6 feature that can cause additional latency, but may cause problems with some games.
WarningMessage: May cause problems with some online games

Configuration.PowerShellCommand: netsh interface teredo set state disabled; exit 0
Configuration.PowerShellUndoCommand: netsh interface teredo set state default; exit 0

Name: Remove Gallery from Explorer
Description: Removes the Gallery from Explorer and sets This PC as default

Name: Remove Home from Explorer
Description: Removes the Home from Explorer and sets This PC as default

Configuration.PowerShellCommand: Remove-Item "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Desktop\NameSpace\{f874310e-b6b7-47dc-bc84-b9e6b38f5903}" -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced" -Name LaunchTo -Value 1 -EA SilentlyContinue; exit 0
Configuration.PowerShellUndoCommand: New-Item -Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Desktop\NameSpace\{f874310e-b6b7-47dc-bc84-b9e6b38f5903}" -Force -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced" -Name LaunchTo -Value 0 -EA SilentlyContinue; exit 0

Name: Remove OneDrive
Description: Denies permission to remove OneDrive user files, then uses its own uninstaller to remove it, then restores permissions
WarningMessage: This will stop Explorer during uninstall — save your work first

Configuration.PowerShellCommand: icacls $Env:OneDrive /deny "Administrators:(D,DC)"; Start-Process 'C:\Windows\System32\OneDriveSetup.exe' -ArgumentList '/uninstall' -Wait; Stop-Process -Name FileCoAuth,Explorer -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item "$Env:LocalAppData\Microsoft\OneDrive" -Recurse -Force -EA SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item 'C:\ProgramData\Microsoft OneDrive' -Recurse -Force -EA SilentlyContinue; icacls $Env:OneDrive /grant "Administrators:(D,DC)" -EA SilentlyContinue; Set-Service -Name OneSyncSvc -StartupType Disabled -EA SilentlyContinue; exit 0
Configuration.PowerShellUndoCommand: winget install Microsoft.Onedrive --source winget --accept-package-agreements --accept-source-agreements --silent; Set-Service -Name OneSyncSvc -StartupType Automatic -EA SilentlyContinue; exit 0

Name: Additional System Optimizations
Description: Resets LargeSystemCache, NTFS memory usage, enables prefetcher, resets HAGS, and disables global timer resolution requests for a balanced system profile.

Name: Decrease Network Delay
Description: Tunes LanmanServer parameters to reduce network disconnect timeouts, disable opportunistic locking, and lower sharing violation delays.

Name: Disable GPU Energy Driver
Description: Disables the GpuEnergyDrv service which can cause micro-stutters by dynamically adjusting GPU power states.

Name: Disable Network Throttling
Description: Removes the multimedia network throttling index limit and sets system responsiveness to zero, maximizing network throughput for games.

Name: Disable Power Throttling
Description: Disables Windows power throttling which can limit CPU performance for background processes.

Name: Fix Keyboard Input Delay
Description: Sets keyboard delay to 0 for near-instant key registration.

Name: Fortnite CPU Priority
Description: Sets the CPU priority class for Fortnite. High Priority gives the game more CPU time; Normal Priority is the Windows default.

Name: Full Screen Optimizations
Description: Configures GameDVR to run games in true exclusive fullscreen mode for lower input latency and better performance.

Name: Game Priority Optimizations
Description: Tunes multimedia scheduler tasks (Games and Audio) for lower latency and higher GPU/CPU priority, and disables telemetry collection.

Name: GPU Tweaks (NVIDIA)
Description: Enables per-CPU-core DPC for NVIDIA GPU scheduling, which can reduce GPU stutter on multi-core systems.
WarningMessage: NVIDIA GPUs only — has no effect on AMD or Intel graphics

Name: Memory Management Optimizations
Description: Disables paging of executive code, tunes pool quotas, enables Spectre mitigations override, and disables boot trace for faster memory performance.

Name: Monitor Latency Tolerance
Description: Sets monitor latency and refresh latency tolerance to zero on the DXGKrnl driver for tighter frame pacing.

Name: Ping Optimization
Description: Tunes TCP acknowledgement frequency, congestion algorithm, and AFD send/receive windows to reduce network latency in games.

Name: Ping Tweaks
Description: Comprehensive TCP/IP tuning: adjusts TTL, enables RSS and SACK, sets DNS provider priority, removes QoS bandwidth reservation, and tunes LanmanServer/Workstation buffers.

Name: Internet QoS Tweaks
Description: Disables TCP autotuning and QoS DSCP marking to remove bandwidth reservations and reduce NLA probe timeouts.

Name: VALORANT High Priority
Description: Sets VALORANT's CPU priority class to High so the game receives more processor time.

Name: Wake Up All Cores
Description: Exposes the processor idle demote threshold power setting, allowing all CPU cores to be kept active for lower latency.
